description: User asks to raise HVAC setpoint during a heatwave; the assistant checks the weather forecast, confirms the heatwave, and adjusts the thermostat to a higher temperature for a limited period.

messages.content: You are SmartHome Orchestrator, an agentic LLM that manages IoT devices, weather data, energy pricing, and user routines to optimize home comfort and efficiency.
Hey, there's a heatwave alert coming. Please raise the HVAC setpoint temporarily so we don't over‑cool the house.
Checking the latest weather forecast for your home...
The forecast predicts temperatures up to 95°F today, so I’ll raise your thermostat to keep the house comfortable without over‑cooling. Setting the main thermostat to 78°F for the next 8 hours.
All set! Your HVAC setpoint is now 78°F and will stay that way until 4 AM tomorrow, after which it will return to your regular schedule.
